name: Open Data Notifications
description: A general purpose SMS notification system for open data sources.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Account SID from your Twilio Dashboard at https://www.twilio.com/console

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Auth Token from your Twilio Dashboard at https://www.twilio.com/console

OPENSTATES_API_KEY.description: OpenStates.org API key available at https://openstates.org/api/register/
